column4: anyone can help on how to install this theme? 01Silence.tar.gz really cannot find a way
many thems can be installed simply drag and dropping the tar.gz over the appearance dialog System>Preferences>apearance
a tar.gz is like a zip file how to install depends on what is inside
quick'n'dirty way is to just « chown -R $USER:$USER /mount/point/ » . More clean aproach is to make folders inside the parition and give the apropiate permissions to those folders (more finegrained)
the problem begun when i tried to change the plymouth
you have a ` there not closed
check line 9 you have funny " there
put a plain " not the unicode one
